name: OB on the sea
description:
OB on the sea

Save animals, collect trash, get to your end destination and don’t run into Bombs or else you will crash!

You and the rest of the OB Team made it to their destiny trying to save the animals in the trash filled oceans worldwide. Your goal is to move the trash to your ship or drive through the trash to get it on the OB.
Each level is getting harder and harder the more you progress in the game. You can also play every level multiple times or even save your progress and start where you left the last time. Think fast but carefully, navigate the ship and your crew on the OB so you don’t crash or sail over any animals!

How to play

Rearrange animals, trash and bombs so you can pick up all the trash and have a clear way to your end destination.

You can move:

Animals only the way they are facing but bombs and trash either horizontal or vertical

You can’t move:

Swirls and islands

Game made by:

Game Artist: Lori Adamo

Game Programmer: Felix Nürnberg
